name: GDIntercept
description: A GD proxy mod which allows you to intercept and modify any communication sent through the Cocos2D-X or Geode web clients.

issues.info: Inform issues through the repository issues page.

theme.name: Theme
theme.description: The theme of the code block.

filter.name: Filter
filter.description: Filters out requests from specific sources.

cache-limit.name: Cache Limit
cache-limit.description: The amount of requests to cache before removing the oldest one.

pause-requests.name: Pause Requests
pause-requests.description: Pauses all requests and sets their timeout to infinite.

censor-data.name: Censor Sensitive Data
censor-data.description: Censors all known sensitive keys in GD and some common sensitive keys.

raw-data.name: Raw Data
raw-data.description: Displays data in its raw state without any manipulation of the text besides capping the amount of rendered characters.

hide-badges.name: Hide Badges
hide-badges.description: Hides the badge icons in the request list.

hide-copy-buttons.name: Hide Copy Buttons
hide-copy-buttons.description: Hides the copy buttons in the code block and info block.

log-requests.name: Log Requests
log-requests.description: Logs all requests made in the current session to the Geode console.
